author: ansgar.eth
content: from my side: obviously this reflects only my personal opinion, and is not related to my ACDE role. It's a bit weird to be both the coordinator for these discussions and have direct involvement in some of these proposed EIPs. I'll try my best to keep that separated, but please call me out if I fail at that.
